name: .ALPX
summary: Learn about .ALPX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open ALPX files in ACDSee Luxea (Windows). To do so, open Luxea, select File â†’ Open Project..., and then navigate to and select your ALPX file.

If you need to review the JSON-formatted text an ALPX file contains, you can open it in any text editor. For example, you might want to open an ALPX file in a text editor if you've misplaced a media file included in your Luxea project.
